DOC.brief_summary: This study tests the effectiveness of the bilingual Health and Success program, which aims to support Latino parents and schools in their efforts to promote the academic success and healthy choices of youth, with the goal of reducing barriers that lead to elevated levels of HIV/AIDS in urban Latino communities.
DOC.brief_title: Addressing Proven Factors in HIV Prevention for Latino Youth
DOC.criteria: youth attend school selected as study site youth in 67th grade parent/youth nonEnglish or Spanish speakers
